segments.text: morning , Mary ? It ’ s John Kramer calling . You remember you handled my tax forms for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , Mr . Kramer . How are things going these days ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Better than ever ! You won ’ t have to worry about “ finding ” extra money for me anymore ! We made nearly a quarter of million in profit last year !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! I ’ m really glad to hear it ! That should make balancing the books a lot easier !
segments.speaker: S2
